title: Requirements Phase: user-authentication-homepage - Ready for Review
response:
Feedback Summary (1 comments):

General Comments:
1. Great, but it is important that this is split into different tasks and commits. I want fx. login backend, login frontend into seperate commits. isolate responsibility of changes at a time to the smallest scope that makes sense.

comments.comment: Great, but it is important that this is split into different tasks and commits. I want fx. login backend, login frontend into seperate commits. isolate responsibility of changes at a time to the smallest scope that makes sense.
